title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: When the menu is popped up, there are two instances of the Revert option.
EB: When the menu is popped up, there is only one Revert option, disabled as it should be.
SR: 1) Open the editor. 2) Make changes to the editor. 3) Make the editor dirty. 4) Popup the menu and verify that only one Revert option is displayed, and it is disabled.
